name: Bloody Pingu
description:
Click/touch on the bear to release Pingu and then click on the bear again to smack the penguin one in true b**** and gore style! Bloody Pingu is a Penguin batting game, with lots of gore. You have to make the Yeti, hit the penguins head as far as you can. Strike the penguin diving from the ...
•smack the penguin
